extendedInfo.description: ***** Weekend half-price sale! We are so happy with the amazing response that the game is getting that we wanted to celebrate! Thank you! If you get a chance, please sign up for our newsletter over at www.firemaplegames.com to learn about upcoming games!  *****Grandma was right. Nobody really believed her. Not even you, her favorite grandchild. But she was right. And more so than you could ever imagine. The city before you, deep in the mist shrouded forest, can't be found on any map. It shouldn't even exist. Though it's been asleep for a long time, you feel a mysterious power begin to awaken from the ruins around you. Legend has it the civilization that built this place could somehow control the seasons. But nobody listens to legends. Nobody except Grandma. And she was right. You look again at the artifact she gave you. Close to this lost city, it almost seems alive in your hand. The city does exist. It's real. Could the secret magic, powerful enough to change the seasons, be real too? Features: â¢ Inspired by classic point and click adventure games! â¢ Beautiful graphics that draw you into this mesmerizing adventure! â¢ Lots of items to collect and puzzles to solve! â¢ Original soundtrack and sound effects! â¢ A journal that keeps track of all the symbols and clues that you encounter. â¢ A dynamic map that shows all of the areas you have explored, as well as your current location. â¢ A complete hint guide and walkthrough built right into the game. â¢ The Lost City has been translated into several languages - with more coming soon!

reviews.title: Beautiful graphics and fun puzzles
reviews.comment: Loved the look and feel of the pages and the puzzles were challenging without being impossible. Great for several hours of play.
reviews.author: John Grover

reviews.title: Fun, interesting, good value
reviews.comment: Short, but beautiful imagery and just the right challenge.
reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Superb. Creates great atmosphere in beautiful graphics. I will be buying all their games if they produce like this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good game!
reviews.comment: Good advanture game with puzzles, plenty of locations, nice graphic. Hope the company produces more games soon - till now only 2 are available in the Market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Point and click delight!
reviews.comment: Stunning and beautiful - fantastic to see this genre on Android and so well executed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reminds of Myst
reviews.comment: Nice graphics, good and motivating puzzles. Would love to see a little more challenging successor, maybe with a more meaningful/mature story/setting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Excellent game if you like the Myst collection. Great graphics and fun puzzles. Well worth the price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good value for what u get
reviews.comment: Entertaining .beautiful graphics. Good puzzles. Make some more fire maple! Kept me intrigued for hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Enjoyable puzzles
reviews.comment: Nice graphics which is crucial to this puzzle game. Pay attention to the changes on screen when events happen. Otherwise you might miss the clues like I did. I had several hours of fun and felt it was a well constructed app game.
reviews.author: Albert Nakano

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: I love it. Nice concept and superb execution !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game... Could be longer
reviews.comment: Very well done, nice graphics, very polished. well worth the money, even it was over a bit too soon! Would recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very well made.
reviews.comment: Obviously it\'s simpler than something like Myst, but not by all that much, and it\'s only a dollar!  On a completely different level than games like Dooors.  Lovely atmosphere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: If you like puzzles this is a very good game. You can tell the devs spent a lot of effort on it. It has a great story and would probably take the most clever person over half an hour to beat it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very enjoyable game
reviews.comment: Visually very appealing and with puzzles well suited to a phone screen. Can be challenging in parts, but the location map and hint guide are a big help.
reviews.author: David Storey

reviews.title: HS Superb!!
reviews.comment: Simply Beautiful and Amazing. Extremely addictive. Enjoyed it a lot... Pls make some more of these kind...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need a longer story line
reviews.comment: The game, graphics and the game play is great, but way too short. Would be better if we could have an optional way for the storyline so the ending can be different. But overall, great game!
reviews.author: Arvid Samudera

reviews.title: Perfect casual fun
reviews.comment: Lovely game, can\'t wait for the third. Gladly paid for both, I suggest you do the same.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s a challenging yet not so challenging all at the same time. Amazing graphics, the stages are so well set out.... Definitely one of your best games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recommended.
reviews.comment: Great graphics, good puzzles, and a good interface. Unfortunately it\'s not very long and there\'s barely any story. I hope their next game improves on those parts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great adventure game
reviews.comment: A rare atmosphere (yes, quite like in the Myst series!) made playing this game a very good time. Puzzles are a bit simple but still pleasant to solve. Please make more! :)
reviews.author: A Google User
